parentId.description: The ID of the parent list, if applicable.

metaData.description: Additional metadata related to the fetched contact lists

processing.description: Indicates if the list is currently being processed.

size.description: The size of the contact list.

error.description: Any error associated with the contact list.

lastProcessingStateChangeAt.description: The timestamp of the last processing state change.

lastSizeChangeAt.description: The timestamp of the last size change.

listReferencesCount.description: The count of references to the list.

parentFolderId.description: The ID of the parent folder containing the list.

metaData_processing.description: Processing status related to list metadata.

metaData_error.description: Error information related to list metadata.

metaData_lastProcessingStateChangeAt.description: Timestamp of the last processing state change for metadata.

metaData_lastSizeChangeAt.description: Timestamp of the last size change for metadata.

metaData_listReferencesCount.description: References count related to list metadata.

metaData_parentFolderId.description: Parent folder ID associated with list metadata.

dynamic.description: Identifies if the contact list is dynamic in nature.

name.description: The name or title of the contact list.

filters.description: Contains filter criteria to fetch contact lists

filterFamily.description: The family to which the filter belongs.

withinTimeMode.description: Specifies the time mode within which the filter operates.

checkPastVersions.description: Specifies if past versions of the filter should be checked.

type.description: The type of filter being used.

property.description: The property on which the filter is applied.

value.description: The specific value for the filter.

operator.description: The operation performed by the filter.

ilsFilterBranch.description: Indicates the branch of the filter applied.

internal.description: Specifies if the contact list is internal (not accessible to customers).

authorId.description: The ID of the user who authored or created the contact list.

limitExempt.description: Specifies if any limits are exempted for the contact list.

teamIds.description: The IDs of teams that have access to the contact list.

portalId.description: The ID of the portal to which the contact list belongs.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the contact list was created.

listId.description: The unique ID of the contact list.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp of the last update to the contact list.

internalListId.description: The internal ID of the contact list.

readOnly.description: Specifies if the list is read-only or not.

deleteable.description: Specifies if the contact list can be deleted.

listType.description: Specifies the type of list, e.g., static or dynamic.

archived.description: Indicates if the contact list is archived or not.
